pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit and Compare Species-Area Relationship Models Using Multimodel Inference // Implements the basic elements of the multi-model inference paradigm for up to twenty species-area relationship models (SAR), using simple R list-objects and functions, as in Triantis et al. 2012 DOI:10.1111/j.1365-2699.2011.02652.x. The package is scalable and users can easily create their own model and data objects. Additional SAR related functions are provided.
